post.text: Hillary Clinton is bought and paid for by Wall Street â€“ BIG TIME! All part of the rigged system being run at YOUR expense. It's time to end the Clinton Corruption and do what is right for the American people! #FollowTheMoney

comment.author: Kyle
comment.text: Well she had Dinner fund raisers of $3,000 to $30,000 a plate , only one's that could afford it are the wall streetrs , no her so called common Folks , and definetely not the Blacks .

replies.author: Britney
replies.text: Even some of "the Blacks" make enough money to donate to good causes Kyle. And go look up how many fundraisers with billionaires Trump has had. It's just as many.

replies.author: Lonnie
replies.text: I'd like to see her have a fundraiser in a shelter. Could you imagine her trying to relate with the homeless? I think Mr. T. has more compassion from stories I'm reading about his life and kindness.
